after: Laozi was a philosopher and poet of ancient China. He is best known as the reputed author of the Tao Te Ching and the founder of Taoism.

Although a legendary figure, he is usually dated to around the 6th centuryÂ BC and reckoned a contemporary of Confucius, but some historians contend that he actually lived during the Warring States period of the 5th or 4thÂ centuryÂ BC.
